description:
Captain Jirara, Dororo`s former superior officer, has gone AWOL from the Keron Army.  Dororo has a suspicion that Captain Jirara is somewhere on Earth, but facing him will require Dororo facing up to his dark past as an assassin in their former platoon.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ドロロ 過去からの刺客
